summary: The SBIR/STTR Reauthorization Act of 2025 aims to reauthorize and modify the Small Business Innovation Research (SBIR) and Small Business Technology Transfer Research (STTR) programs. It focuses on several key areas including: extending program authority, enhancing competition through increased funding and fellowships, improving commercialization, establishing pilot programs, and increasing oversight and simplification. The bill also introduces a commercialization impact assessment to measure the effectiveness of the programs. Several sections relate specifically to the participation of minority institutions.
